path.style: fill:none; stroke-width: 2; stroke: #ddd; transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 1s ease-in-out 0s infinite alternate both running vibratea
fill:none; stroke-width: 2; stroke: #ddd; transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 1.05s ease-in-out 0.1s infinite alternate both running vibratea
fill:none; stroke-width: 2; stroke: #ddd; transform-origin: bottom right; animation: 0.97s ease-in-out 0.03s infinite alternate both running vibratea
